text: Rocío de La Mancha is a 1963 film made in Spain. ==Plot== A car accident changes an orphan's life as she becomes the legal guardian of her four brothers. She meets a woman who sets to return to her husband who is in Paris by asking Rocio to pretend that she is Isabel (the woman's daughter). The father (Carlos Estrada) hasn't seen her in 13 years and doesn't know that the real Isabel is dead. ==Soundtrack== Rocío de la Mancha ==Cast== *Rocío Dúrcal *Carlos Estrada *Helga Liné *Roberto Camardiel *Simón Andreu == External links== * Category:1963 films Category:Spanish films Category:Spanish-language films Category:1963 musical films Category:Films directed by Luis Lucia Category:Spanish musical films
title: Rocío from La Mancha
